https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1wvj1fegZmEeFpNFMKgc0DjL6Zc.jpg The story of young Amos Oz, growing up in Jerusalem in the years before Israeli statehood with his parents; his academic father, Arieh, and his dreamy, imaginative mother, Fania. A Tale of Love and Darkness
